fulltext:
162
Ellis f Bounded linear operator on a non - Archimedean normed space
of the duals.  However,  not every continuous linear map between the duals is the jugate of a continuous linear map between E and F,  In fact,  only those which are weak * - continuous are conjugate maps ( [ 3 ],  p.  204 ). 
References
[ 1 ] N.  Bourbaki,  Espaces vectoriels topologiques,  Chaps I—II,  Actualités Scientifiques et Industrielles 1189,  Paris. 
[ 2 ] A.  Ingleton^ The Hahn - Banach theorem for non - Archimedean valued fields.  Proceedings of the Cambridge Philosophical Society 48 ( 1952 ),  41—45. 
[ 3 ] J.  Kelly and /.  Namioka,  Linear Topological Spaces,  Van Nostrand,  Princeton,  N.  J.  1963. 
[ 4 ] A.  Monna,  Ensembles convexes dans les espaces vectoriels sur un corps value,  Indagationes Mathematicae 20 ( 1958 ),  528—539. 
[ 5 ] A.  Monna,  Espaces localement convexes sur un corps value,  Indagationes Mathematicae 21 ( 1959 ),  391—405. 
[ 6 ] A.  Monna,  Sur le théorème de Banach - Steinhaus,  Indagationes Mathematicae 25 ( 1963 ),  121—131. 
[ 7 ] W.  Schöbe^ Beiträge zur Funktionentheorie in nicht - archimedisch bewerteten Körpern,  Münster 1930. 
[ 8 ] A.  Taylor and C.  Halberg,  General theorems about a bounded linear operator and its conjugate,  J.  f.  d.  reine u.  angew.  Math.  198 ( 1957 ),  93—111. 
Eingegangen 13.  Juli 1966
